sourcesContent:
import { Modal, ModalOverlay, ModalContent, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, Button, useDisclosure, position } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import star from "../../assets/star.svg"; import info from "../../assets/noun-info-3320837.svg"; import './index.css'; export default function Detail({ movie, formattedGenres }) { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); const { id, rank, title, description, ratings, ranking, year, imdb_id, imdb_url, image_url, director, writer, duration, age_certification, } = movie; return ( <>
Rank: {rank}
{ratings}
{title}
{year}
Genre: {formattedGenres}
{description}
Director: {director}
Writer: {writer}
Duration {writer}
Age Certification: {age_certification}
); }
